page.title: 10SOUTH BADDESLEY SCHOOL
page.content: Schools<State> C of E Controlled.S.Baddesley School,founded in 1854 is still housed in its original red brick building.There are 58 pupils aged 5-11 years.The number on the register was falling but in 1985 nearby East Boldre School was closed due to low numbers and 21 pupils came to S.Baddesley.There is a Headmistress and 2 teachers plus various ancillary and part time helpers providing a wide ranging curriculum including music,sports and computor studies.The adjacent village hall is used for mid-day meals physical education and drama.There is a playground and a large playing field.
